properties.title: SMOS+ Rainfall Land
properties.description: The objective of the ‘SMOS+RAINFALL’ project is to ingest satellite soil moisture information derived from ASCAT, SMOS and SMAP into the latest state-of-the-art satellite precipitation products like those derived from the Global Precipitation Measurement mission (GPM) to enhance rainfall observation accuracy over land.
properties.osc:consortium: CNRS, DELEGATION REGIONALE ALPES (FR), CNR-RESEARCH INSTITUTE FOR GEO-HYDROLOGICAL PROTECTION – IRPI (IT), UNIVERSITE TOULOUSE III – PAUL SABATIER (FR)
